name: LD49: Homeward
description:
Your spaceship completed its mission. Now it’s the easy part: get back home.

Except… an asteroid shower hit your ship hard, causing it to become unstable. Will you get back to where you once belonged?

  • The goal is to reach Earth.
  • You cannot do anything while the ship is flying! There are random encounters along the way – you interact during these encounters!
  • There’s a plenty of typos!
